finder.query: WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = ?glblCmpyCd01? AND ORG_CD = ?orgCd01? AND ORG_STRU_TP_CD = ?orgStruTpCd01? AND EFF_FROM_DT <= ?effFromDt01? AND (EFF_THRU_DT >= ?effThruDt01? OR EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL) AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

OR EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL) AND TRTY_RULE_TP_CD = ?trtyRuleTpCd01? AND TRTY_RULE_LOGIC_TP_CD <> ?trtyRuleLogicTpCd01? AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
